description: The image shows a robot interacting with a door. The robot is positioned in front of the door, with its arm extended towards the door handle. The floor is visible in the lower part of the image.

objects.name: door
objects.purpose: The door serves as the target for the robot's interaction.
objects.relationship: The robot is positioned in front of the door, with its arm extended towards the door handle.

objects.name: handle
objects.purpose: The handle is the point of interaction for the robot.
objects.relationship: The robot's arm is extended towards the door handle.
